oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Edgefield Baptist Church, Original Building, 1962
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph of the original building for the Edgefield Baptist Church, located at the corner of South 5th Street and Fatherland Street. Photographed by Bill Driver of the Nashville Housing Authority, 9 October 1962. The Edgefield Baptist Church was first organized in 1867, and construction began on the original church building in 1872. By 1875, the building was completed. The property on which the original building sat was later sold in 1905, and the Edgefield Baptist Church relocated to its current address at 700 Russell Street. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
